channel.title: EA Launches The Origin Great Game Guarantee Program
channel.description:
EA launches [b]The Origin Great Game Guarantee[/b] program today. I wonder how many other game publishers will follow suit.
[url='https://www.guru3d.com/news_story/the_origin_great_game_guarantee.html']https://www.guru3d.com/news_story/the_origin_great_game_guarantee.html[/url]
Enjoy.

item.title: EA Launches The Origin Great Game Guarantee Program
item.dc:creator: Mr_GameCrazy
item.description:
Dadster:

I’m sure that most gamers who purchased Aliens Colonial Marines wish they had this program available to them.

Or that Sim City game. Oh well. Better late than never.

Read full topic
item.source: EA Launches The Origin Great Game Guarantee Program
